TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from her position of Head of Department at the ORG - owned bank , O. ( “ the bank ” ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE she lodged a claim against the bank seeking the reinstatement and compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Sevastopol ( “ the ORG ” ) fined the bank following its CARDINAL consecutive failures to appear before the court .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partly allowed the applicant ’s claim .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ the Court of Appeal ” , since DATE , ORG ) quashed that judgment and sent the case back to ORG which , on DATE dismissed the applicant ’s claim . This judgment was upheld by ORG on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , dealing with the applicant ’s appeal in cassation lodged under LAW ( as amended by LAW DATE ) , quashed the lower court ’s decisions and remitted the case to ORG which , in a judgment of CARDINAL DATE partly granted the applicant ’s claim awarding her ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL ) and UAH CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) in compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage respectively .
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG amended that judgment reducing the compensation for non - pecuniary damage to UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL ) . This ruling was executed in DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG reversed the lower courts’ decisions in respect of the non - pecuniary damages upholding the remainder of their decisions .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , being bound by ORG decision , ordered the applicant to reimburse the defendant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed this decision . The parties did not appeal .

CARDINAL . In the course of the proceedings , the applicant modified her claims CARDINAL times , filed CARDINAL procedural request and CARDINAL appeals or supplements to appeals , which all met procedural requirements .

CARDINAL . According to the Government , of the CARDINAL hearings scheduled during the periods from DATE to CARDINAL DATE and from DATE to DATE , CARDINAL hearing were adjourned due to the defendant ’s failure to attend , CARDINAL were adjourned due to the applicant ’s failure to attend , and CARDINAL hearing was adjourned due to the both parties’ failure to attend .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Nakhimovsky District Prosecutor of Sevastopol opened a criminal investigation against the applicant on suspicion of abuse of authority . Until DATE , the investigation was terminated and reopened CARDINAL times .

CARDINAL . On DATE the investigation was reopened for the fourth time . This decision was quashed on DATE by ORG of LOC . On DATE ORG upheld ORG decision . The investigation was pending for DATE and DATE overall .
